name: Symphony of Mixtures
description:
Description:

Dracula needs his Unholy Water and you're tasked with finding and delivering the correct ingredients! Explore this homage to the classic Castlevania games you know and love in our entry to the Spring 2023 SodorJam, "Symphony of Mixtures"!

Browser Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Z - Confirm / Enter

X - Cancel

Credits:
